name: Balloon Operator
description:
Percussive Maintenance is a Unicorn Engineer in charge of Zeppelins. What he lacks in ability to keep things in good health he makes up for in tenacity.

Keyboard and Mouse or a Gamepad.

Keyboard

  • WASD to move
  • Space to Jump
  • Left Mouse Button to Repair

Controller

  • Stick to Move
  • South Face Button to Jump
  • West Face Button to Repair
